title: Couple With Heart Person Woman Light Skin Tone Dark Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Person And Man Holding Hands With Heart
description: Depicts a loving couple with a person of light skin tone and a man of dark skin tone, linked by a heart, symbolizing their deep affection and bond.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this couple emoji beautifully illustrates a romantic connection between a woman with light skin and a partner with dark skin, encircled by a vibrant red heart. The design, characteristic of Apple's polished aesthetic, features soft rounded edges and gentle gradients that emphasize intimacy and affection. The prominent heart, rendered with a glossy finish, clearly signifies love, partnership, and heartfelt emotions, making it a popular choice on Apple devices for expressing deep fondness.
